Name: XBall Champion
About the game: PROMOTION!!! Now you can get this game for only $0.11 or less on XBall Champion is a casual sport game with unique game play. Features 1. Very simple game play rules 2. Singleplayer & multiplayer modes 3. Steam achievement Controls 1. Classical FPS control scheme (WSAD move & Mouse look) 2. Left mouse button for dash (only available when dash icon shown) Rules 1. Hit the exited (highlighted) ball to get into exited state 2. Score a goal in exited state 3. Team with higher score win the game
